main.name: Griffin Ryan
main.bio: Having seen knowledgeable success in the Seattle music scene, electronic artist 'Torpoise' (A.K.A Griffin Ryan) has performed for recognized institutions such as KEXP, Neumos, and the Musuem of Pop Culture. While not playing music, Griffin is a Mazda Miata enthusiast.
main.contactmessage: If you would like to reach me personally... please do so here! ❤️

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Composed of criteria organized around the study of design and algorithmic focus. Students are geared towards software engineering through basic computer science fundamentals. All curriculum based in Java 8.

work.title: Owner
work.description: Multimedia producer 'Torpoise' is the electronic pop music project of Griffin Ryan. Having been on interviewed on KING5 as the 'young and fresh face on the scene,' Torpoise has played for notable Seattle venues such as Neumos Crystal Ball Reading Room, 90.3 KEXP, The Crocodile, The Vera Project, and many more.

testimonials.text: Torpoise (Griffin Ryan), a 2017 Sound Off! finalist, lived up to his reputation. Steadily garnering respect in the Seattle electronic scene, this fresh voice arrived completely up to the challenge of opening for not just one, but two local favorites. Actively cutting beats and introducing some live instrumentation caught everyone’s attention. Anything less than what was delivered would have fallen flat, but Torpoise’s clear-cut talent lived up to the night’s unusually high expectations.
testimonials.user: Casey Grosso for Dance Music Northwest, January 8, 2020.'
